ref.full: Ebrahiminejadhasanabadi, Mojgan; Nelson, Wayne Michael; Naidoo, Paramespri; Mohammadi, Amir H.; Ramjugernath, Deresh (2018) Fluid Phase Equilib. 477, 62-77.
ref.title: Experimental measurement of carbon dioxide solubility in 1-methylpyrrolidin-2-one (NMP) + 1-butyl-3-methyl-1H-imidazol-3-ium tetrafluoroborate ([bmim][BF4]) mixtures using a new static-synthetic cell
